channel.title: handy on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in handy on Barefoot Rob

item.title: installed ceiling fan for Joanna
item.description: 15:53 Friday 28 July 2017 JST On my way to Gunma today, I stopped by Joanna’s to install a ceiling fan which she had ordered. She took me to a restaurant which served everything on (round) tortillas with the sides folded to make them square. Great to see her again and hear about how things have been going! Been a long time since The Artist’s Way back in the day.

item.title: Made a cat disuader
item.description: ##13:21 Thursday 06 November 2014 JST## I know the nimble cats can jump over it, but hopefully the mean heavy cats will not. There’s a small brown cat who likes to chill on our balcony. We’re not ready for three (3) cats, so haven’t let him inside. But we have been feeding him because… cat! However, there’s a big bully cat who wants the same balcony space so I blocked the small gap where they usually enter the balcony.
